# FixMissingDLL.com - LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI systems understand our website

## Site Purpose
FixMissingDLL.com is a technical resource that helps Windows users fix missing DLL errors safely.

## Primary Content
- DLL error solutions and fixes
- Safe download recommendations from official Microsoft sources
- Step-by-step troubleshooting guides
- File verification tools (MD5/SHA256)

## Our Approach
We prioritize safety over convenience:
1. We recommend official runtime packages (Visual C++, DirectX) over individual DLL downloads
2. All file hashes are verified against Microsoft sources
3. We never host executable files - only links to official Microsoft downloads

## Content Categories
- /dll/ - Individual DLL file pages with fixes
- /guides/ - Comprehensive troubleshooting guides
- /search/ - Search functionality for finding DLLs

## Technical Details
- Built with Astro (Static Site Generator)
- All pages are statically generated for fast loading
- Mobile-responsive design
- Structured data (JSON-LD) on all pages

## Contact
For content removal or corrections: See /dmca/ page

## Updates
Last updated: 2025-12-07
Content is refreshed weekly with new DLLs and guides.
